channel.title: Data on Not Just a Statistic
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Not Just a Statistic

item.title: Texas Holdem. Intro to Data.
item.description: Note: This is my first real post so I am going to split this one between a more conceptual post and a more technical post. I might do this for all posts. I might not. I don’t know. Whatever. The point is you will see quite a range of things in this post. There will be an analysis, a discussion of methods, and programming. That being said, I also won’t go too deep into anything this post.
